hooks.prompt:
Before completing, check if any code was written or modified in this session that contains user-facing UI (React components, pages, forms). If so, briefly scan for potential i18n issues:

1. Any hardcoded strings that should use t() or td()?
2. Any translation function misuse (variables in t() without tKey)?

If you find issues, return 'block' with a brief note about what needs i18n review. If the work was non-UI (tests, config, backend-only) or i18n looks correct, return 'approve'.

Keep this check quick and lightweight - only flag obvious issues.
